Title: A Time to Love and a Time to Die
Actors: John Gavin, Liselotte Pulver, Jock Mahoney, Don DeFore
Plot: In 1944, a company of German soldiers on the Russian front are numbed by the horrors and hardships of war when Private Ernst Graeber's long awaited furlough comes through. Back home in Germany, he finds his home bombed. While hopelessly searching for his parents, he meets lovely Elizabeth Kruse, daughter of a political prisoner; together they try to wrest sanity and survival from a world full of hatred.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
